WIP.title: 🚧​ Work In Progress 🚧​
WIP.2: The application is still under development.
WIP.3: All basic features are already available and functional:
WIP.6: Selection of desired cards and quiz configuration
WIP.7: Start, pause, and resume the quiz
WIP.8: Results at the end of the quiz
WIP.next: Regarding future improvements, here is a non-exhaustive list:
WIP.a: Complete redesign of the interface (except for the letter cards)
WIP.c: Detailed view of each letter in a new interface
WIP.d: Addition of numbers, tones, 20 words [ai máai múan]

letters.outdated: This letter is not used anymore
letters.oh-vowel: Short medial [oh] vowel doesn't have a written form (camouflaged vowel)

quiz.indication: Select at least 1 card to start the quiz
quiz.explanation: Here are all the cards displayed during the quiz
